narrative:
This inspection and exit interview was conducted with the designated person by Curt McGruder-ACI and Dr. Konnie
Plumlee-VMO.  This was a focused inspection to review noncompliant items identified on the inspection conducted
on 10/13/15.
No non-compliant items identified this inspection.
Note:  Facility had presented both dogs identified on prior inspection to a licensed veterinarian for evaluation.  Dog
ID 59 was treated for an inguinal hernia.   At the time of inspection the hernia has re-emerged but the facility has
already scheduled follow up care with the veterinarian.  Dog ID 52 was treated for a severe allergy and received a
dental cleaning.  An antibiotic treatment was prescribed with a follow up evaluation already scheduled.
Additional Inspectors
Plumlee Konnie, Supervisory Animal Care Specialist
